title: "High Traffic"
body:
Riot plz...you're basically turning off non-full custom games cause you need room for clash.

It's fine. Say it. Its not like there's a reason for people to get angry about it.
Unless of course, you're trying to just play it off like it's our fault that the customs aren't working by "spamming them with abnormal amounts of traffic" or something...in which case, fuck you too then. >.>
